node.doctext:
The scope of the [e2comix] group includes [comic book]s of all types: [superhero] yarns, the [comix|underground press], Japanese [manga], and many others. Its members discuss comics both new and old, clue each other in on the latest developments in the industry, announce new comics-related nodes they've created, provide feedback on said nodes, make dumb jokes and generally geek out.

Group members can list any back issues they have available for trade in the collaborative node [Bartertown].

[{linkGroupMessages:Quizro}]
node.title: e2comix
